WITH MENULIST (MENU_ID, HIER_ID, MENU_LEVEL, SEQ_NO) AS ( SELECT AA.ID , CAST(RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SEQ_NO FROM jwa.Menus AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
And AA.PARENT_ID = #PARENT_ID#
And AA.ID = #ID#
And AA.PARENT_ID IS NULL
UNION ALL SELECT AA.ID , CAST(BB.HIER_ID + RIGHT('0000' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)), 4) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS HIER_ID , BB.MENU_LEVEL + 1 AS MENU_LEVEL , CAST(BB.SEQ_NO + '.' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.SORT_SEQ)) AS VARCHAR(MAX)) AS SEQ_NO FROM jwa.Menus AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.PARENT_ID = BB.MENU_ID ) SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID) AS ROW_NO , BB.HIER_ID , REPLICATE(' ', (BB.MENU_LEVEL -1) * 5) + BB.SEQ_NO + '. ' + AA.NAME AS HIER_NAME , AA.ID , AA.NAME , AA.PARENT_ID , CC.NAME AS PARENT_NAME , AA.SORT_SEQ , AA.ASSEMBLY , AA.NAMESPACE , AA.INSTANCE , AA.FORM_TYPE , AA.USE_YN , AA.REMARKS , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME FROM jwa.Menus AA WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN MENULIST BB ON AA.ID = BB.MENU_ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Menus CC ON AA.PARENT_ID = CC.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.ID LEFT JOIN jwa.Users U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.ID Where 1=1
And AA.NAME LIKE '%' + #FIND_TEXT# + '%'
And AA.ID = #ID#
ORDER BY BB.HIER_ID
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO jwa.Menus ( NAME, PARENT_ID, SORT_SEQ, ASSEMBLY, NAMESPACE, INSTANCE, FORM_TYPE, REMARKS, USE_YN, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #NAME#, #PARENT_ID#, #SORT_SEQ#, #ASSEMBLY#, #NAMESPACE#, #INSTANCE#, #FORM_TYPE#, #REMARKS#, #USE_YN#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
Select @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update: UPDATE jwa.Menus SET NAME = #NAME# , PARENT_ID = #PARENT_ID# , SORT_SEQ = #SORT_SEQ# , ASSEMBLY = #ASSEMBLY# , NAMESPACE = #NAMESPACE# , INSTANCE = #INSTANCE# , FORM_TYPE = #FORM_TYPE# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , USE_YN = #USE_YN# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE ID = #ID#
